Class Tasks

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tasks

  • public class Tasks
extends Object
    Tasks are the methods called for by Display through the GUI.

      static String saveLocation

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void copy()
      Copies text in Display's output text field to the system's clipboard.
      static void decode()
      Decodes the loaded image.
      static void encode()
      Encodes the loaded image.
      static int getAverage(BufferedImage image) 
      static BufferedImage getImage()
      Returns untouched image before Black/White filter is applied.
      static void help()
      Displays the user manual to assist the user.
      static void info()
      Displays a dialog containing information about CRYPTICON and its developers.
      static void open()
      Opens a new image.
      static void refreshBWImage(BufferedImage image, int threshold)
      Displays an updated Black/White filtered image.
      static void save()
      Saves the loaded image.
      static void saveAs()
      Saves the loaded image as a specific file in a specific place.
      static void setLoadedImage(String filename)
      Sets the last save location to a global variable, making it accessible when needed.
      static void task1()
      Inverts the loaded image's colors.
      static void task2()
      Fades the colors of the image.
      static void task3()
      Tints the image's colors.
      static void task4()
      Makes the image a mix of only black and white color.
      static void task5()
      Removes a specified color in the loaded image.
      static void task6()
      Grayscales the image.
      static void task7()
      'Colorizes' the image.
